description:
It`s time for the last event, the class relay! Well, I say "class" but if we`re gonna win,
half our team is gonna have to be Futaba in disguise. Huh?  Whatta ya mean we can`t win without relying on one girl to do all the work for us? We`ll be branded losers?! Screw you, ya jerk!
No one wants to see Futaba complying! But…Unfortunately our teamwork`s in the toilet…
W-We`ll just have to figure out  way to use everyone`s unique quirks to give ourselves a chance to win…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mitsugo wa Tsuzuku yo Doko Made mo
These Three Girls Will Keep Going, On and On
みつごは続くよどこまでも
